Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [discord] <jl777c> CHIPS LN network

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [discord] <jl777c> we can create this starting very soon. I want to get some CHIPS LN nodes live and funded so we can offer using CHIPS as micropayments

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [discord] <jl777c> it would also mean to port all the existing LN gui and tools over onto the CHIPS network

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [discord] <jl777c> bounties will be made available for creation of such. current codebase should mostly work with LN after the recent updates

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [discord] <jl777c> i think we need LN GUI, LN explorer equivalent, network visualizer, etc.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [discord] <jl777c> anybody wants to take the lead on this?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [discord] <jl777c> if we also ran low margin CHIPS/KMD and other pairs on barterDEX, that would allow conversion to and from CHIPS

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [discord] <jl777c> basically I want CHIPS to have all the best LN solutions all live working, funded, etc. combined with active marketmakers it can allow people to get LN experience without risking BTC coins, plus BTC txfees are still needed to do the channel creation and that can take a while. with CHIPS it happens quite quickly

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [discord] <jl777c> So I envision the chips website to have a very easy way to get up and running with a CHIPS LN wallet in addition to Agama, a way to get a channel established and payment sent and received
